Text:
Thanks, I am really enjoying reading these old classics again. And the scans are a lot better than the old ones I had.

If you decide to update any in set 1 can you just include them in set 3 as well to make it easier?

For reviewing Set 1, I did find two new Donld Duck scans from the freedisneycomics website (Too many Pets, new cover for Christmas on Bear Mtn and a one pager in Golden Christmas tree), so I updated 3 issues.  Then I liked how the more cropped comic scans looked better on my HP mini laptop.  I am in the process of cropping Set 1.
Set 1 isn't too large a download and you can pick and choose the updated comics with utorrent software.  Release date for Set 1 version 2 won't be until at least end of April.

4c0367 - Donald Duck in "A Christmas for Shacktown" CBDA.cbr is the correct title for that comic.
Two more days and I'll have Set 5 ready!
